QuestData.Title: Fiona's Solution
QuestData.Description: Gidwin was attacked by one of those plant creatures.$b$bFrom the looks of it, he is suffering from some kind of paralysis.$b$bI can make a cure, but I'll need some local ingredients.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Riverbeast Heart, $2oa Swamplighter Venom, $3oa Riotvine, and $4oa Moonlit Herbs.
QuestData.RewardText: Bang-up job, $n! The base is just about ready.
